arts.ttl: Alonso talks Vinicius, Mbappe, Bellingham, Mastantuono, Rodrygo, Cazorla ahead of Oviedo vs Real Madrid
arts.sum: Real Madrid will be in action for a second time this week as they take on newly-promoted Real Oviedo on Matchday 2 of La Liga tomorrow. The Merengues kicked off the new campaign under new manager Xabi Alonso with a narrow 1-0 home win over CA Osasuna, courtesy of a Kylian Mbappe penalty. arts.ttl: Real Oviedo vs Real Madrid: Predicted Lineup for La Liga Clash
arts.sum: Real Madrid are back in La Liga action, as they take on Real Oviedo in the first away game of the season. Xabi Alonso started three of his new signings in the game against Osausna, all of them in a back four.

arts.ttl: Real Oviedo vs Real Madrid Preview: Start Time, Team News, How To Watch, Live Stream, & Odds
arts.sum: Real Madrid take on Real Oviedo on August 24 at the Carlos Tartiere Stadium, the second La Liga game of the season. Real Madrid Team News vs Real Oviedo
